txt.en: Morgul blades can be found in the Circle of Sorrow in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should destroy any Morgul blades that you find.
Talk to Dolenthol in Barad Orhant

'The Nazg√ªl had formidable blades made out of Morgul steel, a terrible ore found here in the Vale. I have seen the Dead in Minas Morgul, wielding those same blades. You know as well as I that these dangerous weapons must be destroyed. Let us search the Circle of Sorrow for such weapons and dispose of them.'

'It concerns me that we fought the merrevail while we sought to destroy the Morgul blades. Are they tasked with stealing the blades from the Dead or did they make a pact of some sort with them? We should investigate this matter further.'
'I have seen the dead in Minas Morgul, wielding blades made of Morgul steel.'
It concerns me that we have fought the merrevail during our task to destroy the Morgul blades.
Dolenthol can be found in Barad Orhant.\n\nYou should talk to Dolenthol.
Dolenthol calls for help to destroy the caches of Morgul steel blades that can be found throughout the Circle of Sorrow.
